title: What course should I take in university to learn programming? - Quora

response.answer_text: Computer Science is the best course if you are learning to program. But if you are to learning to program and to program only, recommend learning a programming language while taking a computer science course or before taking a computer science course as programming mostly rely on the experience and as knowledge the backbone of your code.

The course name will vary, but look for “Introduction to …” and then the language. Should be C, C++, or Java. This course is to get your feet wet, there is plenty more to learn. Some good books on the language in question should be of help. Also look at the web site StackOverflow.
